title: Personalized Language Learning Projects: Smartphone-Based E-Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-/in-service teachers. Conducts language projects using learner-customized content and mobile-friendly tools in limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can select personalized language content with over 80% suitability based on their individual learning style analysis.
Learners can complete group-based language projects (e.g., digital storytelling) using smartphone-based collaboration tools.
Learners can present improvements in individual language skills (speaking/writing) as artifacts (portfolios) through a feedback system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
